meanings.definition: A breed of dog known for its curly coat and intelligence.
meanings.sent1: Poodles are very smart and have curly fur.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of poodles at the dog park.
meanings.sent3: The poodles at the obedience class were the top students.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a poodle, always eager to learn new tricks.
meanings.sent5: The poodle's coat was as curly as a spring.

meanings.sent1: There were two poodles in the dog show.
meanings.sent2: The poodles' owners were proud of their pets.
meanings.sent3: The poodles on the stage looked like fluffy clouds.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the barks of excited poodles.
meanings.sent5: The poodles' tails wagged happily as they played.
